title: Research Topic: Eastern Europe Shock Therapy Network (1989-1999)
summary: Based on the research priority 'Eastern Europe Shock Therapy Network (1989-1999)', this event represents a significant development in the area described as: Document the export of Chilean shock therapy model to former Soviet states through Powell Memo institutional infrastructure... This event demonstrates the interconnected nature of global kleptocracy and corruption networks, involving multiple actors across jurisdictions and highlighting the need for coordinated international response.
